content.value:
Can we all agree the FSF is just a cult now?

Glad to hear RMS regrets that everyone was mad at him.  Must've been how articulate he was. ðŸ™„

Worth noting: if you license your code as GPL X.Y *or later*, then THIS is the org you're trusting to write future licenses. Much doubt. https://t.co/GPUi8TKnug
